column4: Pinky file size limitations and broken downloads can result in segments of an rar being in different archives

It was a good download, it's just the way whoever made them packed it... there are 3 separate files spread out across 49 RAR parts, each of the 3 files having a separate block of files dedicatied to it
Dont know photobooth, but gimp and digikam are good tools
I know of them.  Photo Booth captures images from the MacBook's built-in video camera and can distort it with different effects.
